pullrequest.title: Add inertia pose getter for COMVisual, with test

content.raw:
It turned out that the load from SDF function is actually being used in `rendering::Scene`. Not sure if the function in scene is ever called though. Anyways I fixed the Load from SDF function, did some refactoring and used it in the test. f3ee086

I can do the same for `InertiaVisual` in a later PR.
content.html:
It turned out that the load from SDF function is actually being used in rendering::Scene. Not sure if the function in scene is ever called though. Anyways I fixed the Load from SDF function, did some refactoring and used it in the test. f3ee086
